segments.text: Excuse me . How long has it been since the business was founded ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It has been 12 years since it was founded in 1998 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , it has a history for more than a decade ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . And it was incorporated with other businesses in 2008 due to the global financial crisis .
segments.speaker: S2
